original_title: Mega Lifesciences introduces groundbreaking “WeCare Mother and Child” app
original_body_lines: As a company, Mega Lifesciences is present in 33 countries across the world, with products that play a vital role in categories ranging from women’s health including pregnancy and lactation, bone and joint health, cardiovascular and diabetes to skin and liver health.

The Company recently introduced a digital initiative, Health@Home, which aims at giving the younger generation [ that is increasingly technologically savvy], all the information they are seeking to monitor their health, enabling them to reduce avoidable mortality and morbidity.
